## This website uses cookies

We use cookies to personalise content and ads, to provide social media features and to analyse our traffic. We also share information about your use of our site with our social media, advertising and analytics partners who may combine it with other information that you’ve provided to them or that they’ve collected from your use of their services.

Consent Selection

**Necessary**

**Preferences**

**Statistics**

**Marketing**

Show details

- Necessary 4







Necessary cookies help make a website usable by enabling basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas of the website. The website cannot function properly without these cookies.







- Cookiebot
1
[Learn more about this provider![](data:image/png;base64,)](https://www.cookiebot.com/goto/privacy-policy/ "Cookiebot's privacy policy")


**CookieConsent** Stores the user's cookie consent state for the current domain

**Maximum Storage Duration**: 1 year**Type**: HTTP Cookie

- neura-robotics.com
2



**elementor** Used in context with the website's WordPress theme. The cookie allows the website owner to implement or change the website's content in real-time.

**Maximum Storage Duration**: Persistent**Type**: HTML Local Storage





**wpEmojiSettingsSupports** This cookie is part of a bundle of cookies which serve the purpose of content delivery and presentation. The cookies keep the correct state of font, blog/picture sliders, color themes and other website settings.

**Maximum Storage Duration**: Session**Type**: HTML Local Storage

- neura-robotics.onlyfy.io
1



**PHPSESSID** Preserves user session state across page requests.

**Maximum Storage Duration**: 1 day**Type**: HTTP Cookie


- Preferences 2







Preference cookies enable a website to remember information that changes the way the website behaves or looks, like your preferred language or the region that you are in.







- neura-robotics.com
2



**localTimeZone** Holds the users timezone.

**Maximum Storage Duration**: Session**Type**: HTTP Cookie





**wp-wpml\_current\_language** Designates the country code that is calculated based on the user's IP address. Used to determine what language should be used for the visitor.

**Maximum Storage Duration**: Session**Type**: HTTP Cookie


- Statistics 4







Statistic cookies help website owners to understand how visitors interact with websites by collecting and reporting information anonymously.







- Azure
1
[Learn more about this provider![](data:image/png;base64,)](https://privacy.microsoft.com/en-us/PrivacyStatement "Azure's privacy policy")


**msd365mkttrs** Registers statistical data on users' behaviour on the website. Used for internal analytics by the website operator.

**Maximum Storage Duration**: Session**Type**: HTTP Cookie

- Google
2
[Learn more about this provider![](data:image/png;base64,)](https://business.safety.google/privacy/ "Google's privacy policy")


Some of the data collected by this provider is for the purposes of personalization and measuring advertising effectiveness.



**\_ga** Registers a unique ID that is used to generate statistical data on how the visitor uses the website.

**Maximum Storage Duration**: 2 years**Type**: HTTP Cookie





**\_ga\_#** Used by Google Analytics to collect data on the number of times a user has visited the website as well as dates for the first and most recent visit.

**Maximum Storage Duration**: 2 years**Type**: HTTP Cookie

- neura-robotics.com
1



**isReturningVisitor#** Pending

**Maximum Storage Duration**: 2310 days**Type**: HTTP Cookie


- Marketing 24







Marketing cookies are used to track visitors across websites. The intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for the individual user and thereby more valuable for publishers and third party advertisers.







- Azure
1
[Learn more about this provider![](data:image/png;base64,)](https://privacy.microsoft.com/en-us/PrivacyStatement "Azure's privacy policy")

# TOP 100 Innovation Award 2022

- April 24, 2022

We are happy and proud to be awarded with the TOP 100 Innovation Award, being among the most innovative companies in Germany in 2022.

The TOP 100 Innovation Award is the most important award for Germany’s most innovative SMEs. Together with mentor Ranga Yogeshwar, the TOP 100 honors the most innovative of Germany’s small and medium-sized enterprises. The TOP 100 has been established for over 25 years and is the only competition for innovation management, the most important award for innovative SMEs, and a Club of Excellence made up of Germany’s innovation elite.

Being founded in 2019 in Metzingen near Stuttgart with the clear vision to revolutionize the world of robotics, we have since then made breakthrough advancements in areas such as environment perception, drive and control technology, material science, mechanical design, and AI, allowing us to create MAiRA, the world’s first cognitive robot, bringing a variety of innovations into one product.

If you want to learn more about the TOP 100 award: [click here](https://www.top100.de/die-top-innovatoren/2022/neura-robotics-gmbh.html)

# NEURA Robotics at Automatica 2022

- May 25, 2022

We are preparing to go all out this year at Automatica 2022, one of the leading international trade fairs for automation and robotics, which will take place in Munich from June 21 to 24. If you’re a tech enthusiast, a newbie, or even a robotics fan, this event is for you.

Founded 3 years ago, Neura Robotics has countless successes to its credit in the robotics industry, most notably a breakthrough in cognitive robotics. Cognitive robots that were previously just a concept and seemed impossible to realize are now a reality. David Reger, the CEO and founder of NEURA Robotics, together with a team of international experts, has realized his vision to develop MAiRA, the first commercially available cognitive robot.

Within three years, we have developed a range of advanced technologies and intelligent robots combined with artificial intelligence to alleviate the human workforce shortage and make life easier in general. But it doesn’t stop here!

Visit us at our 500 m² booth (Hall B4.329) packed with all our products that you won’t want to miss:

– MAIRA: Multi-Sensing Intelligent Robotic Assistant. The first cognitive robot.

– MAV: Multi-Sensing Autonomous Vehicle. Revolutionizing intralogistics.

– LARA: Lightweight Agile Robotic Assistant. Performance meets cost efficiency.

World premieres on display also include:

– An intelligent multi-purpose robot serving people in industrial and commercial settings.

– New, lean product variants of MAIRA and MAV.

– An AI training hub to quickly teach new objects to a fleet of robots

Robots manufactured by Neura Robotics can interact with people and work safely in their environment, increase productivity at the required speed, detect the presence of people, and are easy to operate. All major hardware and software technologies are developed and designed in Germany.

This is an opportunity to see the breakthrough technologies we have come to love, as well as the ingenuity and passion to serving humanity through robots that underlie all our products.

[Here](https://exhibitors.automatica-munich.com/en/exhibitors-details/exhibitors-brands/exhibitors-brands-details/ID/1154760/action/detail/controller/Exhibitors/) you can find a glimpse into all that we have to offer at Automatica 2022.

Can’t wait? Access the recording of the [Automationspraxis Websession](https://automationspraxis.industrie.de/robotik_innovationen_mai22/#Anmeldung) (in German) from May 31, where we gave insights about the technologies that are going to be displayed at our booth.

# Automationspraxis Websession

- May 20, 2022

Get a sneak peak of the innovations we will show at automatica 2022!

From June 21 to 24, 2022, automatica, one of the world’s most important robotics and automation fairs, will open its doors in Munich.

With the Automationspraxis websession on May 31, a variety of robotics experts gave a foretaste of the innovative technologies to be showcased at automatica 2022. These topics range from smart vision and sensor technology over innovative gripping technology to intelligent, cognitive robots.

Register to watch the recording of the presentation of our CEO and founder David Reger, who gave you an introduction about how cognitive robots enable true human-machine collaboration in every industry. Of particular importance: software and hardware components developed and produced in-house, creating robots with integrated AI and technology to bring collaboration to the next level.

Register [here](https://automationspraxis.industrie.de/robotik_innovationen_mai22/)
